kanishta anshaya - (6 shreniya - 9 shreniya dakwa) jyeshta anshaya - (10 shreniya - 13 shreniya dakwa) 3.siyaluma pasalwala sisu sisuwiyanta mema tharagaya sandaha athulath wimata haki athara ihatha sandahan karana lada kshethrawalin owunge hastha karmantha nirmana, thama pasale widuhalpathige nirdeshaya matha palath tharaga sandaha idiripath kala yuthuya. 4.palath tharagayen jayagrahanaya karana nirmana athurin ek shilpa kshethrayakin prathama, dewana, thewana sthana ha kusalatha nirmana 03 k washayen jathika tharagaya sandaha idiripath kere. 5.palath jayagrahana laba ganna sisun hata saha jathika mattase kusalatha laba ganna sisun saha sahathika pathra pamanak pirinamana athara, jathika mattamin jayagrahana laba ganna sisun sandaha ek ek kshethra sandaha pahatha aakarayen mulya thyaga da pirinamanu labe.
amarikawe upatha laba athi me sisun boho deneku atham wita indiyawata kedinaka ho gos natha.

2009 koti sanwidhanaya parada eelam yuddhaya jayagrahanayen nimakirima nisa janapriyathwaye hinipeththatama pamini rajapakshawarunge bahina kalawa arambaimata 2012 indhana mila wadiwima ha ehi prathipalada balapa bawa pahadiliya.

shri lankawe jathika udbhida udyana, jathika shakagaraya, udbhida udyana porthamenthuwata ayath aushadha uyan, janadhipathithumage ha agramathyathumage nila niwasa saha karyalawalata ayath udyana da podu rajya mandaliya yuda sohon bim da nadaththuwa menma anuradhapura shri maha bodhiya ha wenath pethihasika shakayan yanadiya raka bala ganime wagakima daranneda jathika udbhida udyana departhamenthuwayi.
